attributes.action: Ban Nicotine Based Fertilisers and Save the Bees and Humanity (EU ban)
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call on HM government to adhere to the ban on the harmful pesticides that have been proved to harm bees and is depleting bee hives all over the world. It is very likely that those harmful effects extend to the human population. Whatever is gained by using pesticide is more than lost if we lose bee pollinisation. Please help and save our environment and give a future to our children
